where is my order: You can track your order from the 'My Orders' section. Click on the order to see the live tracking status.
how can I track my order: Visit 'My Orders' and select the order to view its current status and expected delivery.
when will my order be delivered: Your estimated delivery date is mentioned in your order details. Most orders are delivered within 3–5 business days.
my order is delayed: We're sorry for the delay. Please check the latest status in 'My Orders'. If it's beyond the expected date, contact support.
can I change the delivery address: You can change the address only before the order is shipped. Go to 'My Orders' > Edit Address.
can I reschedule my delivery: If your order is eligible, a reschedule option will be visible in your 'My Orders' section.
why was my order automatically cancelled: Orders are cancelled if payment fails, the product goes out of stock, or if address issues arise.
what payment methods do you accept: We accept credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, wallets, and cash on delivery.
is cash on delivery available: Yes, Cash on Delivery is available for eligible orders and locations.
how can I apply a coupon: During checkout, click on 'Apply Coupon' and enter your code to get the discount.
i was charged twice: We're sorry for the inconvenience. If you were charged twice, the extra amount will be refunded automatically in 5–7 days.
how do i request a refund: Go to 'My Orders' > Select Order > Request Refund. Follow the steps and choose the reason.
how long does it take to get a refund: Refunds are usually processed within 5–7 business days after we receive the returned item.
refund initiated but not received: Please wait up to 7 working days. If it still doesn't arrive, contact support with your order ID.
how can I return a product: Go to 'My Orders', select the item, and click on 'Return'. Follow the prompts to schedule pickup.
can I replace a defective item: Yes, defective items can be replaced within 7 days of delivery through the 'My Orders' section.
when will my return be picked up: Your return pickup will be scheduled within 1–2 days. You'll be notified via SMS/email.
how long does it take to process a retur: Returns are usually processed within 3–5 business days after pickup.
can I return a product after 10 days: Most items have a 7 or 10-day return window. If it's expired, returns may not be possible.
what are the conditions for return eligi: Products must be unused, with tags and original packaging. Electronics must be returned with all accessories.
is this product available in my area: Enter your pincode on the product page to check delivery availability.
will this item be back in stock soon: If out of stock, click 'Notify Me' to receive an alert when it's available again.
can I get more details about this produc: Please check the product description, specifications, and Q&A section on the product page.
do you have size charts for clothing: Yes, each clothing product has a size chart link under the size options. Use it for accurate fitting.
how do I reset my password: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.
how do I change my email or phone number: Go to 'Account Settings' and click 'Edit Profile' to update your contact info.
how can I delete my account: Contact our customer support to permanently delete your account and data.
i can't log in to my account: Ensure your credentials are correct. If you forgot your password, use the reset link.
how do I contact customer care: You can chat with us 24x7 or call us from the 'Help & Support' section.
do you have 24x7 support: Yes, our virtual assistant is available 24/7. Phone/chat support is available 9 AM to 9 PM.
can I talk to a human agent: Yes. Type 'talk to agent' or go to Help > Contact Us to connect with a representative.
where is your nearest service center: Please visit the 'Service Centers' page and enter your pincode to find the nearest location.
are there any current discounts: Yes! Check our homepage or app banner for today’s best deals and ongoing sales.
how can I use my reward points: Reward points can be applied at checkout, if your account has eligible balance.
do you offer student discounts: Currently we do not offer a student discount, but stay tuned for special promotions.
